feed.title: 白罴
feed.subtitle: 闲坐竹林里，淡泊寻常心。

entry.title: Git
entry.summary: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.
entry.content:
Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.

1. Install

$ brew install git
$ git --version

2. Configure

$ git config --global user.name "Your Actual Name"
$ git config --global user.email "Your Actual Email"
$ git config -l

3. Add & Commit

$ git add .
$ git commit -m "Commit message"

4. Push

$ git remote add origin <server>
$ git push origin master

5. Branch

$ git checkout -b feature_x
$ git checkout master
$ git branch -d feature_x
$ git push origin <branch>

6. Update & Merge

$ git pull
$ git merge <branch>

entry.title: Mac-Homebrew
entry.summary: The missing package manager for macOS (or Linux)
entry.content:
The missing package manager for macOS (or Linux)

1. Install

/usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"

2. Usage

$ brew install wget
$ brew cask install firefox

$ brew uninstall wget
$ brew cask uninstall firefox

3. Search

$ brew search git

4. Info

$ brew info git

5. List

$ brew list

entry.title: NVM
entry.summary: Node Version Manager - POSIX-compliant bash script to manage multiple active node.js versions
entry.content:
Node Version Manager - POSIX-compliant bash script to manage multiple active node.js versions

1. Install

$ curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.34.0/install.sh | bash

$ nvm install node
$ node -v

2. List

$ nvm list
$ nvm list available

3. Use

$ nvm use 12.9.0

4. Uninstall

$ nvm uninstall

5. Removal

$ rm -rf "$NVM_DIR"

entry.title: RVM
entry.summary: RVM is a command-line tool which allows you to easily install, manage, and work with multiple ruby environments from interpreters to sets of gems.
entry.content:
RVM is a command-line tool which allows you to easily install, manage, and work with multiple ruby environments from interpreters to sets of gems.

1. Install

$ \curl -L https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable
$ rvm | head -n 1

$ rvm use ruby --install --default
$ ruby -v

2. List

$ rvm list known

3. Use

$ rvm use 2.6.0

4. Default

$ rvm use 2.6.0 --default

5. Remove

$ rvm remove 2.6.0

6. Implode

$ rvm implode

entry.title: Mac-Vagrant-Ubuntu
entry.content:
Development Environments Made Easy

1. Install

$ brew cask install virtualbox
$ brew cask install vagrant
$ brew cask install vagrant-manager

2. Init

$ mkdir rails-va
$ cd rails-va
$ vagrant init ubuntu/bionic64

3. Usage

$ cd rails-va
$ vagrant status
$ vagrant up
$ vagrant ssh
$ vagrant reload
$ vagrant halt

entry.title: 送别
entry.summary:
词：李叔同

长亭外古道边，
芳草碧连天。
晚风拂柳笛声残,
夕阳山外山。
entry.content:
词：李叔同

长亭外古道边，
芳草碧连天。
晚风拂柳笛声残,
夕阳山外山。

天之涯，
地之角，
知交半零落。
一瓢浊酒尽余欢，
今宵别梦寒。
